name: Envision Page Builder
author: Plugin Envision

sections.description:
Envision Page Builder is the ultimate solution for anyone looking to enhance their WordPress website with a powerful page builder. Our plugin is designed to seamlessly integrate with the Gutenberg editor, providing a suite of custom Gutenberg blocks that elevate your website design to new heights. Whether you’re a blogger, a business owner, or a web designer, Envision Page Builder empowers you to create stunning, professional websites without writing a single line of code.

As a leading Gutenberg builder, Envision Page Builder offers a comprehensive library of blocks tailored to meet the diverse needs of WordPress users. Our custom Gutenberg blocks are designed to be intuitive and easy to use, allowing you to effortlessly add elements into your pages. From advanced layout options to dynamic content elements, Envision Page Builder gives you the tools you need to bring your creative vision to life.

One of the standout features of Envision Page Builder is its flexibility. As a WordPress builder, it adapts to your specific design requirements, enabling you to customize every aspect of your site. Our blocks are not only versatile but also optimized for performance, ensuring that your website remains fast and responsive. With Envision Page Builder, you can create a website that not only looks great but also performs exceptionally well.

In today’s digital landscape, a well-designed website is crucial for success. Envision Page Builder helps you achieve a professional website design that stands out from the crowd. Our blocks are designed with modern aesthetics and user experience in mind, providing you with the tools to create visually appealing and engaging websites. Whether you need a sleek portfolio, a vibrant blog, or a sophisticated business site, Envision Page Builder has you covered.

The simplicity of Envision Page Builder makes it accessible to users of all skill levels. As a Gutenberg builder, it leverages the familiar Gutenberg interface, making it easy for beginners to get started while providing advanced options for experienced designers. Our plugin streamlines the web design process, saving you time and effort so you can focus on what matters most – your content.

With Envision Page Builder, you can transform your WordPress site into a dynamic, visually stunning platform. Our custom Gutenberg blocks offer unparalleled flexibility and customization options, making us the go-to page builder for WordPress users. Experience the power of Envision Page Builder and take your website design to the next level today.

Demos

Envision Page Builder Features

  • Custom Blocks: A variety of unique blocks to enhance your site.
  • Responsive Design: Ensure your site looks great on all devices.
  • Highly Customizable: Adjust every aspect to fit your needs.
  • SEO Friendly: Optimized for search engines.

How to use Envision Page Builder

  • Begin by installing the Envision Page Builder plugin.
  • Add the blocks from the “Envision Builder” category within the Gutenberg Editor.
  • Customize settings from the settings sidebar on the right.
  • Enjoy!

For installation assistance, click on the Installation tab.

User Feedback

Did you find this plugin helpful or have any concerns? Do you have a feature request? Please share your feedback with us
sections.installation:
Download & Upload:

  1. Download the Envision Page Builder plugin (.zip file).
  2. In your admin area, go to the Plugins menu and click on Add New.
  3. Click on Upload Plugin and choose the envision-page-builder.zip file and click on Install Now.
  4. Activate the plugin.
sections.faq:
How do I get started with this plugin?

It’s simple! Just install the plugin and add the blocks to your Gutenberg Block Editor page.

Is this plugin compatible with my current theme?

This plugin is compatible with the majority of themes. However, if you encounter any issues, please don’t hesitate to get in touch with us. Our support team is here to assist you in resolving any compatibility concerns.

How can I customize the appearance of the plugin?

After adding the blocks, you’ll see the appearance of a right sidebar that allows you to customize the selected blocks.

Where can I get support for this plugin?

You can post your questions on the support forum here.

Is there a premium version available?

At the moment, there is no premium version available.
